column4: Has anyone else had a problem with the battery monitor only showing "Battery Time Estimating"
yes
on anything, 10.04, 10.10 and 11.04 all do the same thing, i found a link to how to fix it but i cannot find it anymore
do you have acpi installed?
i installed an acpi module before but im not sure, do you have any recommendations on installing it ?
sleep and everything works, brightness does as well, its only the battery monitor. Widgets will show remaining time but i cannot set it up via the gnome one
run acpi -V in terminal and tell me what you get
sudo apt-get install acpi acpid
i have just installed acpi, can i still installed acpid seperately or must they be installed together?
yes
if it is recommended
if not just log out then log back in
i will restart now and let you know what happens
hmmm
it is not a major problem as my Docky applet works fine, it is just annoying
I had that problem. I'm going through my system logs to see what I did to fix it
thank you, if you cannot then it is okay, i value your support already :)
is upower installed?
i believe it is, i wil check
Upower is at the latest version
burg runs on top of grub
ahh i wasnt sure, never used it :p
